attributes.action: People should stop payment for council tax after reaching last year’s figure
attributes.additional_details: The Party that promises to do things at an election should be made into a legal document, therefore the public knows what they are getting
attributes.background: The PM Kier Starmer agree to this as part of his election campaign and promised not a penny more on council tax that’s a labour’s promise

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
